title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Skills: Receptive Language Proficiency Development via Integrated Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science knowledge and language education theories
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze listening materials on diverse science topics to extract key information with 80% accuracy.
Learners can critically read scientific text materials and diagram relationships between key concepts with 75% accuracy.
Learners can enhance receptive language skills by 20% in project-based activities using peer feedback and multimedia resources.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
